channel.title: CVE Feed for Mattermost -- Mattermost Playbooks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mattermost -- Mattermost Playbooks

item.title: CVE-2022-1548|2024-08-03T00:10:02.917Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20playbooks
item.description: Mattermost Playbooks plugin 1.25 and earlier fails to properly restrict user-level permissions, which allows playbook members to escalate their membership privileges and perform actions restricted to playbook admins.
